channel.title: Comments on: Is It More Important Than Reader?

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/03/21/is-it-more-important-than-reader/#comment-4019">lauramoncur</a>.
Trust is one of those intangible items that don't get reflected in budget analysis or project reviews. Hard to win, easily to loose.
That said, I think if Google learns from this and does a better job in the future then I think eventually people (myself included) will gradually start to trust them again.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to lauramoncur.

Trust is one of those intangible items that don’t get reflected in budget analysis or project reviews. Hard to win, easily to loose.

That said, I think if Google learns from this and does a better job in the future then I think eventually people (myself included) will gradually start to trust them again.

item.title: By: lauramoncur
item.dc:creator: lauramoncur
item.description: My sentiments exactly. I have a hard time trusting them anymore.
item.content:encoded: My sentiments exactly. I have a hard time trusting them anymore.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/03/21/is-it-more-important-than-reader/#comment-4017">julien51</a>.
I don't think that is a new situation. My understanding is that they've always leveraged large profits in a few areas to subsidize making nearly everything else free.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to julien51.

I don’t think that is a new situation. My understanding is that they’ve always leveraged large profits in a few areas to subsidize making nearly everything else free.

item.title: By: julien51
item.dc:creator: julien51
item.description: Even worse, for each product without a very clear financial/business incentive for Google, I'll wonder how much time they'll be willing to support it.
item.content:encoded: Even worse, for each product without a very clear financial/business incentive for Google, I’ll wonder how much time they’ll be willing to support it.
